languages.text: "Вайс". {n}Всего одно слово повергает отсек в тревожную тишину. Сузив глаза, Иокаста бросает:{/n} "Надо искать грязные мысли? Очень хорошо, пусть Вайс их отыщет. Он умеет, как бы ни хотел, чтобы мы об этом забыли".

"Weisz." {n}Anxious silence falls the moment Sauerback says this one word. She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Is it unclean thoughts we need to find? Very well. Let Weisz find them. He knows how, no matter how badly he wishes that the rest of us forgot about it."
languages.original_text: "Вайс". {n}Всего одно слово повергает отсек в тревожную тишину. Сузив глаза, Иокаста бросает:{/n} "Надо искать грязные мысли? Очень хорошо, пусть Вайс их отыщет. Он умеет, как бы ни хотел, чтобы мы об этом забыли".

"Weisz." {n}Anxious silence falls the moment Sauerback says this one word. She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Is it unclean thoughts we need to find? Very well. Let Weisz find them. He knows how, no matter how badly he wishes that the rest of us forgot about it."

languages.text: «Weisz». {n}Se hace un silencio intranquilo cuando Sauerback pronuncia el nombre. Entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Tenemos que encontrar pensamientos impuros? De acuerdo, que se encargue Weisz. Sabe cómo hacerlo, por más que desee que los demás lo olvidemos».
languages.original_text: "Weisz." {n}Anxious silence falls the moment Sauerback says this one word. She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Is it unclean thoughts we need to find? Very well. Let Weisz find them. He knows how, no matter how badly he wishes that the rest of us forgot about it."

traits.locale_text: «Weisz». {n}Se hace un silencio intranquilo cuando Sauerback pronuncia el nombre. Entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Tenemos que encontrar pensamientos impuros? De acuerdo, que se encargue Weisz. Sabe cómo hacerlo, por más que desee que los demás lo olvidemos».

languages.text: 「ワイズ」{n}ザウアーバックがその一言を発した瞬間、不安な沈黙が訪れた。彼女は目を細める。{/n}「私たちが見つけなければならないのは、汚れた思考ですね？いいでしょう。ワイズに探させるといい。彼はその方法を知っています…彼がみんなに忘れて欲しいと、どれほど願っていても」
languages.original_text: "Weisz." {n}Anxious silence falls the moment Sauerback says this one word. She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Is it unclean thoughts we need to find? Very well. Let Weisz find them. He knows how, no matter how badly he wishes that the rest of us forgot about it."

traits.locale_text: 「ワイズ」{n}ザウアーバックがその一言を発した瞬間、不安な沈黙が訪れた。彼女は目を細める。{/n}「私たちが見つけなければならないのは、汚れた思考ですね？いいでしょう。ワイズに探させるといい。彼はその方法を知っています…彼がみんなに忘れて欲しいと、どれほど願っていても」

languages.text: “威茨。”{n}当苏尔贝克说出这个名字的时候，周围笼罩在焦虑的沉默之中。她眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我们不是要寻找邪恶的思想吗？很好，就让威茨去找吧，他知道该怎么做。哪怕他再怎么希望我们忘掉之前的事情，这件事情也必须让他来办。”
languages.original_text: "Weisz." {n}Anxious silence falls the moment Sauerback says this one word. She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Is it unclean thoughts we need to find? Very well. Let Weisz find them. He knows how, no matter how badly he wishes that the rest of us forgot about it."

traits.locale_text: “威茨。”{n}当苏尔贝克说出这个名字的时候，周围笼罩在焦虑的沉默之中。她眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我们不是要寻找邪恶的思想吗？很好，就让威茨去找吧，他知道该怎么做。哪怕他再怎么希望我们忘掉之前的事情，这件事情也必须让他来办。”

languages.text: "Weisz." {n}Ein unbehagliches Schweigen tritt ein, sobald Sauerback dieses eine Wort spricht. Sie verengt die Augen.{/n} "Müssen wir unsaubere Gedanken finden? Also schön. Soll Weisz sie finden. Er weiß, wie man das tut, so sehr er sich auch wünschen mag, wir anderen würden es vergessen."
languages.original_text: "Weisz." {n}Anxious silence falls the moment Sauerback says this one word. She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Is it unclean thoughts we need to find? Very well. Let Weisz find them. He knows how, no matter how badly he wishes that the rest of us forgot about it."

traits.locale_text: "Weisz." {n}Ein unbehagliches Schweigen tritt ein, sobald Sauerback dieses eine Wort spricht. Sie verengt die Augen.{/n} "Müssen wir unsaubere Gedanken finden? Also schön. Soll Weisz sie finden. Er weiß, wie man das tut, so sehr er sich auch wünschen mag, wir anderen würden es vergessen."

languages.text: « Weisz. » {n}Un silence de mort s'abat autour de vous à l'instant où Sauerback prononce ce nom. Elle plisse les yeux.{/n} « S'il nous faut rechercher des pensées impures, Weisz est l'homme de la situation. Il sait comment s'y prendre, même s'il préférerait de loin que nous ayons oublié ses talents particuliers. »
languages.original_text: "Weisz." {n}Anxious silence falls the moment Sauerback says this one word. She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Is it unclean thoughts we need to find? Very well. Let Weisz find them. He knows how, no matter how badly he wishes that the rest of us forgot about it."

traits.locale_text: « Weisz. » {n}Un silence de mort s'abat autour de vous à l'instant où Sauerback prononce ce nom. Elle plisse les yeux.{/n} « S'il nous faut rechercher des pensées impures, Weisz est l'homme de la situation. Il sait comment s'y prendre, même s'il préférerait de loin que nous ayons oublié ses talents particuliers. »

languages.text: "Weisz." {n}Sauerback'in bu tek kelimeyi etmesiyle birlikte ortama gergin bir sessizlik çöküyor. Gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Bulmamız gereken günahkâr düşünceler mi? Pekâlâ, bırakalım da Weisz bulsun. Her ne kadar tüm kalbiyle unutmamızı dilese de nasıl olduğunu bilir o."
languages.original_text: "Weisz." {n}Anxious silence falls the moment Sauerback says this one word. She narrows her eyes.{/n} "Is it unclean thoughts we need to find? Very well. Let Weisz find them. He knows how, no matter how badly he wishes that the rest of us forgot about it."
